channel.title: Interesting on mental excess.
channel.description: Recent content in Interesting on mental excess.

item.title: Everything Can Be Found Here.
item.description: A long time ago I came across the Library of Babel. It’s based on a book, that I haven’t read, centered around an infinite library, containing every possible set of text imaginable. That means that although nearly all of the library contains gibberish, there are some books that contain a perfect transcript of the future, bibliographies of every human being, and any other text that can ever be written.
